title: swami ni pAdhamula (varaNam)
sahitya:
sAmi nI pAdamula cAla namminAnu brOvumu

anupallavi

 nA morAlakincarA shrI nAtha shrI rAmacandrapurIsha

svara sAhitya

sArasa samAnamuga ramA ramaNa mAnita suguNa nikara murahara 
saraguna nA vetalu dIrcuTakilanu ninu vinA ghanulu lErani nI
smaraNasEya madi karagaduka kamala lOcana varamu losaguTakidetari
parAkEla dharA pAla taraNi kulAbdhi candra vara lAvaNyanidhE

caraNam

 dayajUDa rAdA nApai
